author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1493596641}
review:
Tags: Hack & Slash - Diabloesque
Additional Tags: Delete local content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Four tiny levels of about 3 minutes of play each. As you fight with the amateur controlling scheme and the lack of camera rotation. 

Just a handful of enemies in each, You get a few powers that are click activated like teleport or drag enemy. The textures are so grainy I remember a sharper level of details from the Original Dos Dungeon Keeper. I liked the made up language and the heavy metal vibe to the setting. The game itself is just fighting to use the powers to do what the game wants you to do, usually something mundane like punch someone, or throw a big enemy in walls while you teleport between beams of fire.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989199444', 'num_games_owned': 1337, 'num_reviews': 139, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1442029580}
review:
To make it simple, Monster Challenge Circus is probably the game that depicts hell in the most convincing way :

-clunky camera control 
-confusing spell selection
-unintuitive mission objectives
-oversimplistic combat system
-glitchy gameplay/cutscene transitions
-horrible use of film grain, if not the worst in video game history

As a demon that lust for revenge you must make your way through 4 levels that will take less than 1 hour to complete, even with trial and error.

To make things even worse, the story revolves around a father-son relationship that is strangely reminiscent of Freud's oedipus complex. How awkward could it get?

To be honest, it is quite disappointing that Monster Challenge Circus turned out as an unfinished product since it had some potential. Imagine a game like Sanity : Aiken's Artefact but with a Thrill Kill/Silent Hill twist. This is what the game could have been.

Here is the full playthrough :
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mPZ7_dQnDY4

Rating :
1.0 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198011364752', 'num_games_owned': 2514, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1434429950}
review: A blurry unplayable mess.  Poor controls, sluggish responses, poor player direction, looks as though it was developed by someone with severe cataracts, bad sound direction and an incomprehensible story.  It's just a sloppy waste of time from top to bottom.  You may think "Well, maybe it's so bad it's good" but it's not -- it's just bad.  Not ironically bad, not funny bad, just "wow, this was a waste of my time and money bad".

author: {'steamid': '76561198025775748', 'num_games_owned': 147, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1419846840}
review:
Pelasin pelin läpi ja oli ihan jees, läpipeluuseen meni noin 30 minuuttia ja bugittamiseen, crashaamiseen ym. turhaan se 5 minuuttia.
Peli on hinnoteltu oikein, eli just sellaseks et seo hyvä antaa kaverille trollilahjaks (niinkun itse sain tän sellasena).

Pelissä pääsee käyttämään demonisia voimia ja heittelemään jotain lihavaa miestä, jos kertoisin vielä että pelissä pitää tappaa vihollisia lyömällä niitä niin spoilaisin koko pelin. Oho...

Pelissä on vain 4 kenttää, joka on kylläkin vain hyvä ettei tätä peliä tarvitse pelata enempää kuin sen mitä oli pakko (tää peli ostettiin mulle vaan sen takii et streamaisin tän playthrun).

Huom! Tämä peli EI ole toimintapeli, vaan puzzle-peli missä pitää miettiä miten peli EI kaadu tai bugita. Suurin puzzle kuitenkin pelissä on sen kontrollit koska niitä ei kerrota mitään koko pelin aikana. Erityisesti numeroilla valittavat "voimat" ovat täysin epäloogisessa järjestyksessä... taino ei siin kyl mitään logiikkaa ole muutenkaan.

Suosittelen ostamaan kavereille vitsinä!

author: {'steamid': '76561198066516938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1417438475}
review:
[table]
    [tr]
        [th][h1]Monster Challenge Circus[/h1][/th]
        [th][url=http://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Freegamer] Freegamer   [/url][/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Metascore[/td]
        [td]N/A
[/td]
    [/tr]
[tr]
        [td]備考[/td]
        [td]Card：×　Achievemen：×　Multi：☓　Price :¥498

[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]レビュー[/td]

[td]
常に予想の斜め下を行く[url=http://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Freegamer] Freegamer [/url]はいつも私を楽しませてくれる.
それはこのMonster Challenge Circusも例外ではない.

マウス操作から来る操作性の悪さ、短調なアクション
数十分程度で終わるストーリーなど…
汚臭が漂うゲーム内容は楽しげなCircusとは程遠い.

[h1]プラスポイント[/h1]
[u][b]●掴みは◎[/b][/u]
開幕から大音量のミクスチャーボイスと合わせてトレーラーが流れる.
FreegamerのゲームはOPが本編と言っても過言ではないので
（肝心な本編が残念な為）購入した際は是非堪能しよう.

[h1]マイナスポイント[/h1]
[u][b]●操作性が悪い[/b][/u]
マウス操作型アクションゲームのこのゲームはとにかく操作性が悪い.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=349616722 
クリックによる移動で、カメラ固定な為、スキルメニューバーに誤入力してしまったり
止まれなくてトラップに突っ込んでしまったり
攻撃したい敵を選ぶ事が出来なかったりと、何かと不満が残る.

[u][b]●単調なアクション[/b][/u]
攻撃スキルは全部で６種類あるが、基本攻撃のPunch以外
HPを消費するので使い所を選ぶ事になる.

敵を倒した後、食べる事が可能で、[b]敵一体でも全回復[/b]出来る親切設計.
どうしても二面、三面は敵を運ぶ為にスキルのDragが必要になるが
それ以外は攻撃は[b]食べて殴ればクリアは可能な為[/b]
非常に簡単で短調なゲームと言える.

[u][b]●数十分程度で終わるストーリー[/b][/u]
何故主人公は敵を食べる必要があるのか？
それは彼が人の肉体を取り戻す必要があるからだ.
このゲームは暗黒面に落ちた主人公が時間の螺旋を漂っているという
ストーリーの非常に深いゲームだが、作中では残念だが[b]一切説明されない.[/b]

このような深いストーリーがあるにも関わらず
30分程度でクリア出来る非常に短いステージ構成は
私は残念でならない.Freegamer、もっと出来たんじゃないのか？と.
[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]総評[/td]
[td]
実績もカードも付いて来ない上に面白くないので
通常の神経の持ち主ならまず買わないと思うが
収集家やこのようなゲームが好きな方は是非.いやお勧めはしませんが.
[/td]
http://store.steampowered.com/app/300910

author: {'steamid': '76561197984913388', 'num_games_owned': 656, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1411281268}
review:
This has to be one of the weirdest games I've ever played. The story is a little incomprehensible, I have no idea what the origin language is (Russian?), the events of the game seem bizarre and alien. The controls are weird (it doesn't even mention the space bar which seems to slow time & defend when you aren't moving, in addition to allowing you to turn the camera) and inexplicable. 

If you want to experience something unique and bizarre, grab this when it's on sale. 

I don't recommend this as a game that's fun to play, I recommend this because it's so weird that it has to be experienced. It cannot be fully explained with simple words.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074947227', 'num_games_owned': 1727, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1400909813}
review:
Игра какое то кривое [b]ДНО[/b], мало того что управление [b]КАЛИЧНОЕ[/b], так и настройки ни о чем, перенастроить можно только скилы и то толку мало и не понятно.
Хоть и прикольная стилистика адовых монстров - но по мне цена слишком [b]ЗАВЫШЕНА.[/b]
Надеюсь разработчики или мододелы что нибудь придумают и сделают по нормальному.

Проходите мимо этой игры. [b]3/10.[/b] :spg2bomb:

author: {'steamid': '76561198006068964', 'num_games_owned': 1916, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1400276966}
review:
REVIEW (UPDATED)(another update: see bottom for ultimate reason why you should not get this game)

This game is the afterbirth of all the games available on Steam. It is terrible on every single level. Bugs, glitches, goblin darts, they're all there.

Music is awful.
Voice acting is that of a Simlish Rammstein song.
Gameplay is poop.
Whoever thought the idea of adding a grain filter so deep you could cut through it was a terrible idea.
Game crashes galore.
DO NOT BUY

FURTHER ANALYSIS:
This game is STILL on Steam Greenlight since January 2014, waiting to be greenlit. However it has now been published by Strategy First, who have released about a hundred OLD games on Steam within the past couple of months. No early access, no greenlighting procedure, etc. I then took a look at the Strategy First website, and there is absolutely no mention of DEHON Monster(s) Challenge Circus.

This is not an old game. This was started in 2010, and was just released yesterday (16/05/2014). Who the hell greenlit this? Who sat at a desk with three hundred other games and said "YEAH THIS IS OK TO RELEASE. GREENLIGHT IT"

I'm honestly not sure what FreeGamer's goal here is with this..... thing too. They certainly aren't a professional studio, that's for sure, with one post refering to their logo which is a crudely drawn GOAT, and connects this with the line of games they are associated with. WHO CARES! What matters is the GAMEPLAY!

In my initial review I forgot to mention that the game crashes every single time after dying, and choosing a game mode. 
I also forgot to initially mention how ridiculously short this is, with four RIDICULOUSLY SHORT STORY MISSIONS and then 4 survival arenas. FreeGamer promised 3 to 4 hours of gameplay. That is crap.

UPDATE #2: I just downloaded the demo of this game that was made available on Gamershell. Already I could see that the file sizes were similar. However...aside from only two levels only being available for each game mode, and less than 1MB difference, the file contents of each of the versions IS THE SAME.
How the hell did you think you could get away with this?!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gq1hoZaFNck
